## Source: ossf-package-analysis (00076e3fa2882cf70c07ddb3715929161c6cd4253e088b91f38c06d9612e5edc)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified '@azix058/design-system' @ 10.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
